video.title: The Magicians
video.synopsis: When grad student Quentin Coldwater enters a college specializing in magic, he learns that the mythic fantasy world he once read about is very real.

episodes.synopsis: Alliances are forged and enemies are made when best friends Quentin and Julia take an entrance exam to Brakebills, a secret university for magicians.
episodes.title: Unauthorized Magic

episodes.synopsis: Quentin faces harsh discipline after contributing to an ill-advised attack on Brakebills, while Julia does her best to impress the Hedge Witches.
episodes.title: The Source of Magic

episodes.synopsis: Quentin and Julia have a talk that's anything but friendly, and Alice continues her quest to connect with her long-lost brother.
episodes.title: Consequences of Advanced Spellcasting

episodes.synopsis: Quentin's memories are treated as delusions at a mental hospital. Marina and Julia come calling when Dean Fogg lowers the spell protecting Brakebills.
episodes.title: The World in the Walls

episodes.synopsis: Quentin receives some tough news from his family, Penny makes a shocking discovery in the basement, and Julia joins forces with Pete.
episodes.title: Mendings, Major and Minor

episodes.synopsis: First-year students face a set of challenges known only as the Trials. If they pass, they stay at Brakebills. If they fail, they're out for good.
episodes.title: Impractical Applications

episodes.synopsis: Quentin and his classmates travel south to train with a demanding professor, who gives Kady some awful news. Meanwhile, Julia faces a personal crisis.
episodes.title: The Mayakovsky Circumstance

episodes.synopsis: Penny suffers a surprising and brutal attack, Quentin and Alice grow closer, and Julia makes a fateful connection at a rehab facility.
episodes.title: The Strangled Heart

episodes.synopsis: Quentin, Alice, Penny and Eliot search for a magic button at the Plover's estate but instead make a discovery that could change everything.
episodes.title: The Writing Room

episodes.synopsis: Trapped between worlds, Penny seeks help from the feuding Quentin and Alice, who must put their drama aside to save their friend before it's too late.
episodes.title: Homecoming

episodes.synopsis: Quentin and company try to determine the best strategy to take down the Beast, while Julia and Kady seek a way to make an otherworldly connection.
episodes.title: Remedial Battle Magic

episodes.synopsis: In the Neitherlands, the crew makes an unexpected discovery about a mysterious student. Meanwhile, Quentin gets a cold dose of truth from Dean Fogg.
episodes.title: Thirty-Nine Graves

episodes.synopsis: Quentin and Julia travel to Fillory where they try to track down their friends and search for a way to kill the Beast once and for all.
episodes.title: Have You Brought Me Little Cakes

episodes.synopsis: Quentin, Alice, Eliot and Margo devise a new strategy to defeat the Beast, while Julia agrees to a deal that could cost more than she realizes.
episodes.title: Knight of Crowns

episodes.synopsis: Julia and Quentin work at cross purposes, Penny seeks a fix for his hands, and Eliot discovers that his new title comes with its share of dirty work.
episodes.title: Hotel Spa Potions

episodes.synopsis: Curses plague Fillory's royal court, so Penny concocts a heart-stopping plan. Elsewhere, Julia inches closer to exacting retribution on Reynard.
episodes.title: Divine Elimination

episodes.synopsis: Margo helps Eliot cope with the weight of the crown. Julia recruits an ally. Quentin and Penny form an uneasy alliance for a common goal.
episodes.title: The Flying Forest

episodes.synopsis: Ramifications from Reynard's attack continue to torment Julia, while Eliot receives life-changing news and Quentin tries to adapt to his new reality.
episodes.title: Cheat Day

episodes.synopsis: A desperate Quentin turns to Alice's family for help, Eliot and Margo face off with a royal foe, and Julia and Kady track down a lead.
episodes.title: The Cock Barrens

episodes.synopsis: Julia finds help for her problem, but the price is much higher than she ever anticipated. Quentin remains haunted by what happened to Alice.
episodes.title: Plan B

episodes.synopsis: Missing shade and sentient trees spell trouble when Julia lands in Fillory. Meanwhile, Quentin makes a perilous pact and Penny gets a tempting offer.
episodes.title: Word as Bond

episodes.synopsis: Despite the heavy toll, Quentin just can't bear to let Alice go. Eliot goes mano-a-mano after a singalong. Penny, Kady and Julia locate Reynard's son.
episodes.title: Lesser Evils

episodes.synopsis: Quentin's unexpected encounter sends him on a quest to help Julia. Eliot's wedding approaches. Penny and Kady hunt down an overdue library book.
episodes.title: The Girl Who Told Time

episodes.synopsis: With their lives on the line, Julia and Quentin venture down into the unknown. Back in Fillory, Eliot and Margo deal with a sudden vermin problem.
episodes.title: The Rattening

episodes.synopsis: Julia and Kady gather weapons ahead of their showdown with Reynard. Quentin tries to do right by Alice. Eliot looks for a way back to his throne.
episodes.title: Ramifications

episodes.synopsis: The fight to save Fillory reaches its climax -- and the aftermath could have devastating consequences for everyone.
episodes.title: We Have Brought You Little Cakes

episodes.synopsis: Searching for a way to bring back magic, Quentin and Julia wind up at a wild party. Eliot and Margo chafe under the watchful eye of the Fairy Queen.
episodes.title: The Tale of the Seven Keys

episodes.synopsis: Eliot gets some unexpected company as he sets off on an epic quest, while Quentin, Julia, Josh and Kady try to track down a potential magic source.
episodes.title: Heroes and Morons

episodes.synopsis: Scared and hunted, Alice turns to family. Eliot and his crew run into trouble on the high seas. Kady enlists help when Penny's condition worsens.
episodes.title: The Losses of Magic

episodes.synopsis: As Penny grows frustrated with his failure to communicate, Quentin and Julia try to unravel a Brakebills mystery related to one of the keys.
episodes.title: Be the Penny

episodes.synopsis: Quentin and Eliot attempt to figure out a seemingly unsolvable puzzle, Margo commits to an alliance, and an emotionally fragile Kady seeks help.
episodes.title: A Life in the Day

episodes.synopsis: Despite warnings, Julia and Alice move forward with a dangerous plan. Margo tries to dissuade a persistent swain. Quentin embarks on an adventure.
episodes.title: Do You Like Teeth?

episodes.synopsis: With help from Penny and Poppy, Quentin devises a daring scheme to retrieve another key, while Margo goes on the offensive against the Fairy Queen.
episodes.title: Poached Eggs

episodes.synopsis: Getting into and out of the Underworld Library proves a perilous undertaking for the gang. Meanwhile, Irene McAllistair calls in her marker with Julia.
episodes.title: Six Short Stories About Magic

episodes.synopsis: The cottage suddenly turns into a fun zone -- complete with singing, dancing and party tricks. In Fillory, Eliot and Margo face the music.
episodes.title: All that Josh

episodes.synopsis: Julia tries to persuade Fen to contact her greatest foe. Quentin, Alice and Josh take the quest to Fillory. Penny struggles against his fate.
episodes.title: The Art of the Deal

episodes.synopsis: On an unexpected mission to an alternate timeline, Julia and Josh meet faces from the past and present as they confront a shocking enemy.
episodes.title: Twenty-Three

episodes.synopsis: Quentin wants answers from Alice. Julia finds new ways to use her magic. Eliot and Margo hit the campaign trail. Kady copes with the change in Penny.
episodes.title: The Fillorian Candidate

episodes.synopsis: As the quest for the seven keys nears its end, Quentin and Julia move toward their destinies, the Fairy Queen offers a deal, and a new threat emerges.
episodes.title: Will You Play with Me?

episodes.synopsis: A magical identity crisis triggers confusion and calamity for the Brakebills gang. Alice winds up in chains and searches for a way out.
episodes.title: A Flock of Lost Birds

episodes.synopsis: Margo feels royally ticked off in Fillory. Quentin endures pain and sacrifice in Greece. Dean Fogg goes on a cathartic tour of the Brakebills campus.
episodes.title: Lost, Found, F**ked

episodes.synopsis: A stuffed animal full of bad mojo spells trouble for Quentin, Margo places Josh in a problematic spot with a pal, and Alice devises an escape plan.
episodes.title: The Bad News Bear

episodes.synopsis: When Josh's lycanthropic urges enter a dangerous new phase, Margo seeks a solution. Quentin finds solace from an unsettling source. Julia gets anointed.
episodes.title: Marry F**k Kill

episodes.synopsis: To locate a secret door, Eliot takes a long, emotional walk down memory lane. Quentin and Alice must work together to get blood from a stone.
episodes.title: Escape from the Happy Place

episodes.synopsis: Alice reaches out to a magically inclined do-gooder, Penny and Marina run into timeline trouble, and Margo takes a stab at diplomacy in Fillory.
episodes.title: A Timeline and Place

episodes.synopsis: Kady sets off on a quest when her rent comes due, Zelda proposes a way for the Library to track down Alice, and Fen finds her dreams are all too real.
episodes.title: The Side Effect

episodes.synopsis: Alice goes to see her mom after cutting a reluctant deal with Zelda, and Quentin receives startling news while hunting down an item for a dragon.
episodes.title: Home Improvement

episodes.synopsis: As Kady contends with a crisis in the hedge witch community, Alice confronts her inner self, and Margo makes a command decision about Eliot.
episodes.title: The Serpent

episodes.synopsis: Searching for a way to save Eliot, Margo travels through the desert in a song- and hallucination-filled journey of self-discovery.
episodes.title: All That Hard, Glossy Armor

episodes.synopsis: While chasing down a spell, Quentin and Alice reckon with their romance. Julia, Penny and Margo host unforeseen guests. Kady and Zelda plot a break-in.
episodes.title: The 4-1-1

episodes.synopsis: Quentin becomes the key to uncovering a stockpile of magic, Kady learns a distressing secret in the Poison Room, and something fishy is up with Josh.
episodes.title: The Secret Sea

episodes.synopsis: The group's fight to save their friends becomes a battle for magic itself -- and leads to an unthinkable loss that will change them forever.
episodes.title: No Better to Be Safe Than Sorry

episodes.synopsis: Julia and Penny feel the surge  of magic  while Brakebills catches the wave of new magicians, and Eliot and Margo drink in the Dark King's scene.
episodes.title: Do Something Crazy

episodes.synopsis: To bee or not to bee: Margo tries to warn Josh and Fen. Alice's plan to resurrect Quentin as a golem backfires. Jane's magical stamp tempts Eliot.
episodes.title: The Wrath of the Time Bees

episodes.synopsis: While bringing peace to Quentin, Eliot and Alice tangle with Takers, meet a wizard and get real. High Kings turn, and Julia learns of a lethal surge.
episodes.title: The Mountain of Ghosts

episodes.synopsis: To help the hedges, Kady and Dean Fogg take a merry trip. To save the planet, Julia taps a wannabe rock star. To aid Fillory, Eliot flirts with Seb.
episodes.title: Magicians Anonymous

episodes.synopsis: Move the moon? The gang converges on a key rock. Kady and Zelda go to Hell's Kitchen, Eliot makes a monstrous discovery, and an old frenemy reemerges.
episodes.title: Apocalypse? Now?!

episodes.synopsis: Enter the lunapocalypse. At least the harmonic convergence isn't happening anymore. The group troubleshoots, and Eliot lobbies to release the kraken.
episodes.title: Oops!... I Did It Again

episodes.synopsis: New mission: Save Fillory. At a blood-spattered Brakebills, acting Dean Penny encounters an interloper. A fairy shines a light on a king's darkness.
episodes.title: Acting Dean

episodes.synopsis: Time to ovary up for botany lessons and body-swapping as Eliot and Margo trade faces and Alice outwits sentient spores. The bunny spills the beans.
episodes.title: Garden Variety Homicide

episodes.synopsis: Margo and Fen uncover Seb's roots while Eliot channels a lost love. Penny and Plum go to 1998, and Alice and Kady take the tortuous route to an enemy.
episodes.title: Cello Squirrel Daffodil

episodes.synopsis: Josh's cooking can't get him out of this jam, but Margo's eye might. A trapper reveals himself, Hades broods in Queens, and a fetus leads the way.
episodes.title: Purgatory

episodes.synopsis: Dead gods appear with a warning for the High Kings  and a solution. Hyman stirs, Fen lashes back, and Penny opens up. Marina bakes cookies.
episodes.title: Be the Hyman

episodes.synopsis: Motherhood's on Penny's mind as Marina recaps her failed seed theft. The gang choreographs a new, improved heist. But first, a song and dance or two.
episodes.title: The Balls

episodes.synopsis: Santa spreads joy, but end-times are underway, and Julia's water breaks. Get ready to rapture Fillory and be heroes. Is it possible to begin again?
episodes.title: Fillory and Further
